# Skinet Project Instructions

## Project Overview
This is an e-commerce application built with Angular, .Net and Stripe for payment processing. The project is organized into a `skinet/` folder containing all source code, tests, and documentation. Follow the guidelines below to maintain code quality and consistency across the project.

## Working Directory
All code changes must be made within the `skinet/` folder.

## Code Standards
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow ESLint configuration
- Use camelCase for variables, PascalCase for components

## Folder Structure
```
skinet/
├── API/                # .Net backend code
├── client/             # Angular frontend code
├── Core/               # Core utilities and shared code
├── Infrastructure/     # Infrastructure code, e.g., database, services
├── Tests/              # Unit and integration tests
├── README.md           # Project documentation
```

## Do NOT
- Modify files outside `skinet/`
- Delete existing files without explicit permission
- Change configuration files without approval
